casebody.data:
Milton CAMPBELL
v.
COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided December 6, 2016

Craig A. Sullivan, in support of the petition.

Kathryn W. Bare, assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The petitioner Milton Campbell's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 169 Conn.App. 901, 149 A.3d 1019 (2016), is denied.

ESPINOSA, J., did not participate in the consideration of or decision on this petition.
